title: development327
author: development327
content: Bitcoin will be the biggest means of fulfilling dreams in the future.Many types of dreams remain in our minds since childhood.  Those who are a bit middle class in this society are more suffering.  Because they see a big dream but cannot make that dream come true.  So for the middle class Bitcoin will be a medium to fulfill the dream.Why investing in Bitcoin will make dreams come true?In today's society, those who are middle class.  They don't have much income.  But from the outside, he doesn't let anyone know that he is having a hard time.  His income runs out to support his family.  If you collect some amount of money in a month, you can't dream too big with it.  So if he keeps buying the rest of the bitcoins.  Then sometime go and get a good amount of money.  And we know that Bitcoin prices fluctuate.  And whenever the price of Bitcoin goes up, he will profit.  That will help him fulfill his dream.Why invest in Bitcoin without saving money at home?If you have 1 month's salary left over for your family's needs.  Leave it in a corner at home.  Then you will not benefit from that money alone.  The money you keep will be the money.  Day by day the value of your money will decrease.  And if you invest in bitcoins you have a hope that you will be patient until your target is reached.  Once your target is met, you can sell as many bitcoins as you want.  Or when you need it, you can sell it immediately according to your need.So if you want to fulfill your dreams in life then invest in Bitcoin then you will be able to fulfill your dreams very soon.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: It can be considered as a way to make our dreams come true. Before finding way into it, everyone need to understand well about it and proceed further. Because, most of the sufferings and negative things about bitcoin gets due to the involvement into bitcoin investment without proper understanding. They just find it an easy way of turning rich or fulfilling dreams within specific time period. When things weren't the same, it turns to be disappointed. So, we should we'll understand the market the time period and more other connective factors.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: If I was you OP, I would remove the "very soon" in the last sentence, bitcoin is indeed a good and profitable means of investment, but understand that, if you must make good money through bitcoin, then your investment must be for the long term, gone are the days when people made good money from bitcoin investments over night, if you are thinking of investing in bitcoin, then better think long term, for bitcoin investments doesn't really bring in any tangible profit during bear seasons.And again, also do not rule out the risks involved in bitcoin, and crypto currency investments in general, in as much as we all look on the brighter side always, which is making profit from our bitcoin investments, do not forget that the possibility of losing money is also there, carefulness must be applied in all decisions that has to do with investing in bitcoin and cryptocurrencies in general..

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: development327 on March 23, 2023, 11:31:30 PMBitcoin will be the biggest means of fulfilling dreams in the future.Many types of dreams remain in our minds since childhood.  Those who are a bit middle class in this society are more suffering.  Because they see a big dream but cannot make that dream come true.  So for the middle class Bitcoin will be a medium to fulfill the dream.You post just reminded me of a recent topic I saw about a guy celebrating his new achievement, and he was really excited about how Bitcoin has been able to make him achieved one of his dreams and because I was skeptical about the thread I forget to release the things that I also have been able to achieve with Bitcoin and how my life has been transformed ever since I discovered Bitcoin.If you checked most people who became successful or whose life changed after discovering cryptocurrency you'll see that most of them were involved in Bitcoin.

comments.author: adzino
comments.body: Yeah, investing in Bitcoin might offer a chance to grow one's wealth over time due to its potential for price appreciation in the long run. And like you said, if someone keeps buying small amounts of Bitcoin consistently (even a little every week), they could eventually see their investment grow after few years. The $10 that they invested today, might become $50 if he keeps on holding it. But one shouldn't forget that investing in any crypto currencies, including Bitcoin, comes with risks. The price can never be predicted. The $10 you invest today, might also become $1 after few years (very highly unlikely though). So one should do their own research before investing in any crypto currencies.

comments.author: mvdheuvel1983
comments.body: Quote from: development327 on March 23, 2023, 11:31:30 PMBitcoin will be the biggest means of fulfilling dreams in the future.Many types of dreams remain in our minds since childhood.  Those who are a bit middle class in this society are more suffering.  Because they see a big dream but cannot make that dream come true.  So for the middle class Bitcoin will be a medium to fulfill the dream.I agree to an extent. However, I must caution you to not give a messianic status to bitcoin.I would say that it is one of the biggest means to fulfilling our childhood dreams.Speaking about childhood dreams, I have often fantasized that we get to continuously run our generators that provides electricity for our farm using milisatoshis that it instead of fossil fuel. The idea is that whenever, we start getting low on it, we generate a code and input it on the device and then it can generate electricity for another 7 days, 2 weeks, one month or whatever duration we may have paid for.Please do not come for me, it is still a crazy idea in progress.

comments.author: Gallar
comments.body: you only discuss on the positive side, indeed bitcoin is the most minimal risk and most profitable digital asset. but keep in mind, there is such thing as an investment market going up and market down, what you discuss is only the rising market and profits, without explaining that you have to be on guard against losses that must be borne.what you said is not wrong, but you can say you have forgotten the risks that must be borne by bitcoin investors. especially with medium economic conditions, it will certainly be very difficult to manage finances in small amounts with large expenses, let alone having to invest.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: Quote from: Gallar on March 24, 2023, 07:34:24 AMyou only discuss on the positive side, indeed bitcoin is the most minimal risk and most profitable digital asset. but keep in mind, there is such thing as an investment market going up and market down, what you discuss is only the rising market and profits, without explaining that you have to be on guard against losses that must be borne.Yea, bitcoin is a risky investment due to its volatile nature but if you hold for long,the benefits becomes higher than the risk. If you study bitcoin cyclic movement, you will hold on till after the halving and sell at ATH. With this strategy you will make profit.Quote from: Gallar on March 24, 2023, 07:34:24 AMit will certainly be very difficult to manage finances in small amounts with large expenses, let alone having to invest.OP, was not referring to a poor man who don't have enough to eat. He stated it that a middle class i.e working class person,he will always have his little savings from his monthly salary after he must have given care of his basic needs.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Everyone has whatever that bugs and occupied their minds in a regular basis but the ability for you to hand them all depends on how creative and learned they are. Usually as a human Being we are we must not come to air out how weak we are or how poor they seems to be, whatever places you founds yourself you can start small this doesn't necessarily mean you must start big to become the well known investors and individuals.Your income could be very small but I believe you must have a structure of your income, what I meant by structure is "portfolio or plans" in a way how your money should go or could be spent out. Whenever you makes the right plan then you will understand your condition is not a barrier, you can start with as little as you think of not necessarily getting a whole lot of bitcoin but can start your investment with fractions. As matter of facts holding your salary in fiat makes it even worst for you but whenever you are being paid and you convert to btc, here there are two major things involved since bitcoin is on a faster rise this period you could make additional profits, but if it happens to be dip then you could lose some cents in $.

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: development327 on March 23, 2023, 11:31:30 PM-snip-Why investing in Bitcoin will make dreams come true?The volatility of bitcoin is not too high if at this level they are just starting, so I doubt buying "leftover" bitcoins will even fulfill some of the dreams for the family conditions you describe here. Except for small dreams that don't need big efforts to make them come true.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: I strongly agree that saving in Bitcoin is way better than saving fiat in a bank. Especially in the long term, Bitcoin may really be of great help to fulfill some of our dreams. But I don't want to make Bitcoin a kind of false hope to many. Success in life doesn't depend on Bitcoin. Fulfilling your dreams doesn't have to include Bitcoin. It's certainly wrong to make it appear as though Bitcoin is the manna sent down from heaven, the one every hopeless person on earth has been waiting for all his/her life. Develop your skill. Master it. It will bring you great success. Bitcoin? Yes, it's a good way to store your money, that is, if you have the money. But know that it, too, might one day perish.

comments.author: Newbie.
comments.body: Investing in Bitcoin is like chasing a dream with a rollercoaster ride. You never know when you will hit the jackpot or end up broke. But hey, dreams don't come true without taking risks, right?

comments.author: xSkylarx
comments.body: The problem is that if your salary is just enough for you and your family it is difficult to set aside unless you have side hustle to earn some extra money. I really have a high hope in bitcoin that is why i do buy always small bits of bitcoin when i do have salary just to be prepared also with halving but we also keep in mind that we can't predict the price of Bitcoin in the future that is why we still invest what we can afford to lose, it doesn't mean that if we invest to Bitcoin it is a sure profit.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: Lucky are those who have invested in bitcoin because they can realize their dreams one by one and will achieve other dreams. And that is why now many people have started to realize the potential benefits that bitcoin can give them so they start investing in it to have more. But they will not be successful in achieving their dreams if they only think about making profits in a short time. They have to stay invested in bitcoins for a certain amount of time and hold it until the price actually hits a price peak and then they can sell it at that high price. And after they sell it, they can use the money from the profit to buy their dream.

comments.author: kelechi
comments.body: That is the main reason I pack my Ownr wallet with btc

comments.author: CoinEraser
comments.body: Quote from: Newbie. on March 24, 2023, 11:32:37 AMInvesting in Bitcoin is like chasing a dream with a rollercoaster ride. You never know when you will hit the jackpot or end up broke. But hey, dreams don't come true without taking risks, right?Yes that's true, unfortunately. There is no investment without risk, not even bitcoin. So the saying is always true: never invest more than you can afford to lose. As long as you stick to it, the risks are certainly manageable and worth a try. Either way, you should always decide for yourself whether you want to take the risk or not, since there is always the possibility of losing your investment.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: That's true and many dreams have been fulfilled with the past bull runs. But we don't know each other's situation, even if someone badly wants to invest in bitcoin, they just can't because of the given situation that they're dealing.We're lucky and fortunate enough that we're currently in a better situation because we're free and able to invest whenever we want or whenever there's excess with our daily, weekly or monthly budget coming from the sources of income that we've got.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Quote from: development327 on March 23, 2023, 11:31:30 PMIf you have 1 month's salary left over for your family's needs.  Leave it in a corner at home.  Then you will not benefit from that money alone.  The money you keep will be the money.  Day by day the value of your money will decrease.  And if you invest in bitcoins you have a hope that you will be patient until your target is reached.  Once your target is met, you can sell as many bitcoins as you want.  Or when you need it, you can sell it immediately according to your need.Fiat loses value due to inflation and hoarding much of it is bad. Like half of it should be left in fiat for daily expenses. Selling off bitcoin anytime when one needs fund for daily expenses could make one run into lose when the market is in bearish period.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Quote from: development327 on March 23, 2023, 11:31:30 PMSo if you want to fulfill your dreams in life then invest in Bitcoin then you will be able to fulfill your dreams very soon.Thanks to bitcoin the dreams of many early adopters have already become true. And now, in our case we still have the hope and expectation our dreams can become reality as well through bitcoin investment, although in order to achieve that, bitcoin has to increase in price a lot yet, unless we hold many bitcoins in our wallets, what isn't the case of most investors who have up to some millions of satoshis only.I'm not sure if holding such amounts will be enough to complete te desired goals in life, so better that these investors have another plans in life besides bitcoin towards financial freedom. As we say in investments' world, don't put all your eggs on the same basket. Don't put all your hopes into a single investment...
